title: Who Has the Best Hair at IGN? - Gregway
description:
ARE YOU KIDDING ME?! What kind of question is that?!

SUBSCRIBE/LIKE/SHARE

Leave your questions for Greg in the comments and check back every Wednesday and Friday to see what he's saying.

Subscribe to Greg's channel: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=gameovergreggy

Our Merch Store is live: http://www.districtlines.com/gameovergreggy

transcript_chunks.text: what's up everybody Welcome to a gregway every Wednesday and Friday I take a question from the comments on this here YouTube video and or tweets you sent me at game over gregy and I make a video answering them it's fun you like it so you like the video then you subscribe to the channel then you and I hang out at packs and we go with like air guitars and it's never happened before uh today's question comes from Taylor Taylor says who has the best hair at IGN Taylor get the out of here who is the Fran Mirabel the third this is IGN law there's no nobody even tries to challenge this there's not even a question like he asking who would I likes Wings the most clearly me who is the best hair at IGN Fran this has been a long running joke for as long as Fran work there which has been something like 30 years he's an old man he doesn't look it but let me tell you what old dude FR is very particular about his hair you know in the in the IGN Studio we shoot up at noon they also do the daily fix

30 years he's an old man he doesn't look it but let me tell you what old dude FR is very particular about his hair you know in the in the IGN Studio we shoot up at noon they also do the daily fix Naomi she hosts daily fix she bought a bunch of hair care products in there you see Fran run in there and I've seen him run in there and spray down his hair with hairspray and then he's got this whole regimen and then one day we were out drinking and I he I forget how we started talking about hair and I was talking about that I condition every day and he flipped the out he looked at me he's like Greg you only condition Tuesday and Thursday from now on like all right FR that's kind of advice you take from him when I give you Wing advice you take it Fran Mirabella gives you hair advice you take it he's a beautiful man with a beautiful head of hair here's a montage of Fran mirabella's hair [Music] [Music] so there you have it ladies and gentlemen that's how this Greg way works you ask me a

it he's a beautiful man with a beautiful head of hair here's a montage of Fran mirabella's hair [Music] [Music] so there you have it ladies and gentlemen that's how this Greg way works you ask me a question I answer in video form we all have a good time so make sure you leave your questions in the comments below then talk to me on that their Twitter like subscribe the video just do everything I ask you to do it's not that hard until next Wednesday or Friday have a good time and I'll see you around the bend I didn't say gregway that time I'll see you around the bend see you around the bend [Music] Jesus
